archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: AP Case Management
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Automated payment inquiry. Management of queries related to the ‘automated payment product’ which result in the engagement of the transaction correction process and refund calculation for under or over payments (Transformed from Access to Sequel 2015). Built on MS Dynamics?
20 users.
Every single enquiry is recorded in this database since 2009 till date. Generates unique reference number. Data can be searched by FADCode. Used daily. Multiple people are using this database.
